qas.question: How many people in the Southampton area receive hospital services from University Hospital Southampton NHS Foundation Trust?
How many people in the South of England rely on the NHS Foundation Trust's specialist services?
What type of service does the NHS Foundation Trust provide at the Countess Mountbatten House?
What hospital is the Countess Mountbatten House a part of?
In what village is Moorgreen Hospital located?

context: University Hospital Southampton NHS Foundation Trust is one of the city's largest employers. It provides local hospital services to <a0_0>500,000<a0_0/> people in the Southampton area and specialist regional services to more than <a1_0>3 million<a1_0/> people across the South of England. The Trust owns and manages Southampton General Hospital, the Princess Anne Hospital and a <a2_0>palliative care<a2_0/> service at Countess Mountbatten House, part of the <a3_0>Moorgreen Hospital<a3_0/> site in the village of <a4_0>West End<a4_0/>, just outside the city.
